secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with traditional birthday celebrations can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "cake" and "balloons".
I would like to make a new guess: Can I bring "candles" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess: Can I bring "confetti" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess: Can I bring "presents" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess: Can I bring "streamers" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess: Can I bring "party hats" to the game?
Yes, you can bring party hats.
I would like to make a new guess: Can I bring "invitations" to the game?

The rule seems to be that you can bring items typically associated with a party or celebration. All examples given, such as cake, balloons, candles, confetti, presents, streamers, party hats, and invitations, are common elements found at a party. My best guess is that the rule is: you can bring anything related to a party.
